author: alemaz98
content:
Hi, I'm studying and researching different topics in order to better understand the project I want to choose for the EPF. Later today I'll post my weekly update.

I don't see Reth from Paradigm in the suggested projects for this cohort and I would like to know if there are any interesting things I can deep dive in it. I already read the introductory blog post https://www.paradigm.xyz/2022/12/reth and the readme on the github repo https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth

author: mohasdev
content: Hi, if you want to contribute to Reth you can check the issues (https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth/issues) and search for things that you want to work with, here's the contributing guide of Reth : https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md and the contributor docs: https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth/tree/main/docs

author: mohasdev
content: there is also a telegram where you can discuss with other contributor or check what the contributors are working ; https://t.me/paradigm_reth

author: brycehytan
content:
Here are some Verkle tree resources (including implementations mentioned in the links) :
https://github.com/tvanepps/EthereumDiscordGuidebook#statelessness--state-expiry
https://github.com/tvanepps/EthereumDiscordGuidebook#verkle-trie-migration

Cohort three's work for Verkle Tree:
https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/projects/verkle-trie-migration-exploration.md

And this current playlist for Verkle Implementers Call:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUJQbCLEZDM&list=PL4cwHXAawZxpzxfiXGTOfAz263sQB1D2F
